Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Westbound Reroute near Lawrence/Lipps
ShortDescription: Westbound 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Lipps.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Lipps.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #157 Streeterville/Taylor Temporary Reroute at Western/Taylor
ShortDescription: 157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Roosevelt, and Ogden due to, street blockage at Western/Taylor.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Western, Roosevelt, and Ogden due to, street blockage at Western/Taylor.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #86 Narragansett /Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Ridgeland/Berkshire
ShortDescription: Narragansett /Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, North Ave, Austin, Chicago and Ridgeland due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#Narragansett /Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Narragansett, North Ave, Austin, Chicago and Ridgeland, due to street blockage near Ridgeland/Berkshire.

Allow extra travel time.
